title: Looking for Ranked 5's team (Silver 5)
body:
Hi all,

I play top/mid/jungle and I am willing to play and learn as a team. I want to play for fun and competitively. Please message me to find out more. IGN: OnMaccasWIFI

replies.body: If you're still interested we have a position available if you'd like to discuss a training schedule?
sweet! just add me and we'll talk , my ign is the same as this one
